channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Could retail actually rebound in 2026? These are the chains — and trends — to watch.
item.description: Beyond the biggest chains, the past few years have largely been ones to forget for retailers, as shoppers have remained wary about spending amid a bat...

item.title: Tesla EV sales fall short of Wall Street’s low expectations
item.description: Tesla’s rough year took it to its second straight annual sales decline, and saw it lose its global EV sales leadership to China’s BYD.

item.title: Tax-related selling could set up these 11 stocks for big gains early in 2026
item.description: Insider share ownership and corporate profitability are key to finding stocks that have been temporarily sold off.

item.title: China is using silver as an economic weapon. What that means for investors and prices.
item.description: China controls around 70% of the silver that Big Tech, AI and solar power desperately need. Beijing is locking the gates.

item.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
